Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Chaxapeptin (Phe-rich; natural AMPs; lactam; class 2 lasso peptide; class 1 microcin, bacteriocins; Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes; XXJ; UCSB1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 50% similarity toFROG CPF-RP-F1.Activity: Active against Gram-positive strains, S. aureus and B. subtilis (MIC 30-35 ug/mL), and no activity against the Gram-negative bacteria up to 50 ug/ml. It also showed dose dependent inhibition of A549 cancer cells.Structure:  You can rotate, zoom, and view one of the 3D structuresherein the PDB.
Literature Information.Author: Elsayed SS, Trusch F, Deng H, Raab A, Prokes I, Busarakam K, Asenjo JA, Andrews BA, van West P, Bull AT, Goodfellow M, Yi Y, Ebel R, Jaspars M, Rateb ME. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Chaxapeptin, a Lasso Peptide from Extremotolerant Streptomyces leeuwenhoekii Strain C58 from the Hyperarid Atacama Desert
